title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 1570/84 of 4 June 1984 temporarily and totally suspending the Common Customs Tariff duties on certain products to be used in the construction, maintenance and repair of aircraft
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 1570/84
of 4 June 1984
temporarily and totally suspending the Common Customs Tariff duties on certain products to be used in the construction, maintenance and repair of aircraft
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1984.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 4 June 1984.
For the Council
The President
J. DELORS
